title: The Trick of Life and Love
overview: When you rescue the man who annoyed you the most and he wakes up with amnesia, what kind of relationship can you expect?Overbearing CEO Ningcheng Ming has a reputation as a "professor from hell". After a mysterious car accident, he was saved by Li Qian, whom he had not seen for many years. They were enemies. Once she was a witty student, and now she is a versatile secretary.
